project.description:
Yocto Sumo S5p4418 weekly build
매주 일 03:00 trigger됨. <!-- Managed by Jenkins Job Builder -->

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "***************************************" echo " Jenkins - Yocto environment setup " echo "***************************************"
export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo s5p4418 tiny " echo "************************************" ./tools/build.sh s5p4418-navi-ref tiny -c
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo s5p4418 qt " echo "************************************" ./tools/build.sh s5p4418-navi-ref qt -c
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo s5p4418 ubuntu " echo "************************************" ./tools/build.sh s5p4418-navi-ref ubuntu -c
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo s5p4418 ubuntu " echo "************************************" ./tools/build.sh s5p4418-convergence-svmc ubuntu -c

#!/bin/bash
cd yocto/out
echo "************************************" echo " clean old dirs " echo "************************************" rm -rf result-*-tiny*-weekly.tar.gz rm -rf result-*-tiny*-weekly rm -rf result-*-qt*-weekly.tar.gz rm -rf result-*-qt*-weekly rm -rf result-*-ubuntu*-weekly.tar.gz rm -rf result-*-ubuntu*-weekly rm -rf result-*-lava-test.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " unnecessary .ext4 file remove " echo "************************************" rm -rf result-s5p4418-navi-ref-tiny/*.ext4 rm -rf result-s5p4418-navi-ref-qt/*.ext4 rm -rf result-s5p4418-navi-ref-ubuntu/*.ext4 rm -rf result-s5p4418-convergence-svmc-ubuntu/*.ext4
echo "************************************" echo " BUILD-INFO.txt copy to result dir " echo "************************************" cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-s5p4418-navi-ref-tiny/ cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-s5p4418-navi-ref-qt/ cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-s5p4418-navi-ref-ubuntu/ cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-s5p4418-convergence-svmc-ubuntu/
echo "************************************" echo " Compress result dirs " echo "************************************" tar cvzf result-s5p4418-navi-ref-tiny.tar.gz result-s5p4418-navi-ref-tiny/* tar cvzf result-s5p4418-navi-ref-qt.tar.gz result-s5p4418-navi-ref-qt/* tar cvzf result-s5p4418-navi-ref-ubuntu.tar.gz result-s5p4418-navi-ref-ubuntu/* tar cvzf result-s5p4418-convergence-svmc-ubuntu.tar.gz result-s5p4418-convergence-svmc-ubuntu/*
echo "************************************" echo " For LAVA Test " echo "************************************" cp result-s5p4418-navi-ref-ubuntu.tar.gz result-s5p4418-navi-ref-ubuntu-for-lava-test.tar.gz cp result-s5p4418-convergence-svmc-ubuntu.tar.gz result-s5p4418-convergence-svmc-ubuntu-for-lava-test.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename tarballs " echo "************************************" mv result-s5p4418-navi-ref-tiny.tar.gz result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-tiny-navi-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly.tar.gz mv result-s5p4418-navi-ref-qt.tar.gz result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-qt-navi-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly.tar.gz mv result-s5p4418-navi-ref-ubuntu.tar.gz result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-ubuntu-navi-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly.tar.gz mv result-s5p4418-convergence-svmc-ubuntu.tar.gz result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-ubuntu-convergence-svmc-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename result dirs " echo "************************************" mv result-s5p4418-navi-ref-tiny result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-tiny-navi-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly mv result-s5p4418-navi-ref-qt result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-qt-navi-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly mv result-s5p4418-navi-ref-ubuntu result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-ubuntu-navi-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly mv result-s5p4418-convergence-svmc-ubuntu result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-ubuntu-convergence-svmc-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly
